SEND.LABEL: Ilebula
SEND.LABELPLACEHOLDER: Faka ilebuli yale kheli ukuze uyifake ekhelini lakho lekheli
SEND.INPUTLOCKED: Okokufaka kuvaliwe. Kuzodingeka uvule lokhu okufakwayo ukuze uyisebenzise.
SEND.ALERTFEECHANGECONTENT: Imali yokuthenga yangempela iphakeme kunalindelekile. Sicela uqinisekise imali entsha:

STAKING.NOTENABLEDINSTR: Ukubambezeleka kuzodinga ukunika amandla amandla we-staking setting staking = 1 kufayili yakho ye-metrix.conf.
STAKING.NOTSTAKINGINSTR: Ungaqala ukuphawula ngokuvula isikhwama sakho se-staking

MASTERNODES.NOMNOUTPUTS: Akukho ukuphuma kweMasternode okutholakele. Ukuze usebenzise iMasternode yendawo thumela ngqo izinhlamvu zemali ezi-2,5,25,50 noma eziyi-100 ekhelini lakho leMasternode bese ulinda iziqinisekiso eziyi-15.

SIGNMESSAGE.SIGN_DESCRIPTION: Ungayina imilayezo ngamakheli wakho ukufakazela ukuthi ungumnikazi wabo. Qaphela ukuthi ungasayine lutho olungacacile, njengoba ukuhlaselwa kwe-phishing kungase kuzame ukukhohlisa ukuthi ungene ngemvume kubunikazi bakho. Yisayine izitatimende ezigcwele ngokugcwele ozivumelanako.
SIGNMESSAGE.VERIFY_DESCRIPTION: Faka ikheli lokusayina, umlayezo (qinisekisa ukuthi ukopisha ama-break breaks, izikhala, amathebhu, njll njll) nesignesha ngezansi ukuze uqinisekise umlayezo. Qaphela ukuthi ungafundi okwengeziwe kwisiginesha kunalokho okukulo myalezo osayinwe uqobo, ukugwema ukukhohliswa ukuhlaselwa komuntu phakathi.

DEBUG.CONSOLEINFO: Siyakwamukela ku-console ye-Metrix Core RPC. Thayipha usizo ukuze uthole ukubuka kabanzi kwemilayezo etholakalayo.
DEBUG.CONSOLEWARNING: ISEXWAYISO: Abakwa-Scammers basebenza, bethela abasebenzisi ukuthayipha imiyalo lapha, beba okuqukethwe kwabo isikhwama. Ungasebenzisi le console ngaphandle kokuqonda ngokugcwele ukuhlanganiswa komyalo.

REPAIR.INFOEXTERNAL: Le miyalo yokulungisa ayikwazi ukusebenza ngenkathi i-Metrix Core iqhutshwa ngaphandle
REPAIR.INFO: Izinkinobho ezingezansi zizoqala kabusha i-Metrix Core ngezinketho zomugqa wamakhomithi ukulungisa i-wallet, ukuxazulula izinkinga ngamafayela we-blockchain abonakele noma ukuthengwa okungekho / okungahleliwe.
REPAIR.SALVAGEINFO: -salvagewallet: Ukuzama ukuthola izinkinobho zangasese ezivela esikhwameni esonakele.dat.
REPAIR.RESCANINFO: -rescan: Qala kabusha i-blockchain yokuthengiswa kwekhredithi engekho.
REPAIR.RECOVER1INFO: -zapwallettxes = 1: Ukubuyisela ukuthengiselana kusuka ku-blockchain (gcina idatha ye-meta, isib. umnikazi we-akhawunti)
REPAIR.RECOVER2INFO: -zapwallettxes = 2: Buyisela ukuthengiselana kusuka kwe-blockchain (yehlisa idatha ye-meta)
REPAIR.UPGRADEWALLETINFO: -upgradewallet: Thuthukisa isikhwama sefomethi kwamuva ekuqalisweni. (Qaphela: lokhu akusikho isibuyekezo sekhredithi ngokwayo!)
REPAIR.REBUILDINDEXINFO: -reindex: Yakha kabusha i-blockchain index kusuka kumafayela wamanje we-blk000 ??.
REPAIR.BOOTSTRAPINFO: Ukulanda amafayela we-Metrix blockchain kusuka ku-metrixcoin.com naku-bootstrap ukufakwa kwakho. Kuya ngoxhumano lwakho lwenethiwekhi lokhu kungathatha imizuzu eyi-10 emahoreni ambalwa
REPAIR.SYNCFROMSTARTINFO: Susa amafayela wakho we-blockchain wangakini bese uphinde uvumelanise kusukela kubhulini le-genesis.
REPAIR.RESTARTCOREINFO: Qala kabusha iMetrix Core uma ivele isebenza noma iqala iMetrix Core uma ingasebenzi.
REPAIR.REINSTALLCOREINFO: Susa i-Metrix Core yangakini bese uyifaka kabusha kumaseva weMetrix.

EXPLORER.TITLE: Vimba i-Explorer
EXPLORER.SEARCHNORESULTS: Ayikwazi ukuthola i-block noma ukuthengiselana okufanisa nokusesha kwakho

NETWORK.PROXYTOR: Sebenzisa ummeleli we-SOCKS5 ohlukile ukuze afinyelele ontanga ngezinsizakalo ezifihliwe zi-Tor
NETWORK.RESTARTREQUIRED: Ukuqala kabusha kwamakhasimende kuyadingeka ukuze kusebenze noma yiziphi izinguquko kulezi zilungiselelo.
NETWORK.SYNCINTERVAL: Ukuphakama kangaki kubuza i-daemon (Okuzenzakalelayo: Amasekhondi ayi-10)

PROMPT.CLIENTUPDATEINFO: Ukubuyekeza kuyatholakala ku-Metrix Core. Ungathanda ukuyifaka manje?
PROMPT.WALLETUPDATEINFO: Ukubuyekeza kuyatholakala ku-Altitude. Ungathanda ukulanda manje?
PROMPT.CLIENTSTOPPEDINFO: Ukuxhumeka kulahlekile ku-Metrix Core. Ungamisa isikhwama sakho noma uqale i-Metrix Core yangaphakathi.
PROMPT.ENCRYPTEDCONTENT: Noma yikuphi ukusekela okudlule okwenzile kwefayili yakho ye-wallet kufanele kuthathwe indawo yefayela elifakwe esikhwameni esisha, elibethelwe. Ngezizathu zokuphepha, i-backups yangaphambilini yefayela le-wallet elingabhalisiwe ngeke libe usizo uma usuqala ukusebenzisa isikhwama esisha, esibhalwe phansi.
PROMPT.CLIENTCLOSEDUNEXPECTEDINFO: Kube nenkinga ngeMetrix Core eyenze ukuthi inqanyulwe. Kunconywa ukuthi uhlole ifayela lakho le-debug.log ngezinkinga.
PROMPT.CLIENTINVALIDCONFIGINFO: I-metrix.conf yakho inesethaphu esingalungile se-masternode esizokwenza ukuthi uMetrix Core aphume ngokushesha. Sicela uhlole leli fayela.
PROMPT.BOOTSTRAPFAILEDINFO: Kube nenkinga ekubolekeni kwe-Metrix Core. Kunconywa ukuthi uhlole ifayela lakho lokungena le-Altitude ngezinkinga.
PROMPT.STARTUPFAILEDINFO: Kube nephutha ukuqalisa i-Metrix Core. Kuyanconywa ukuthi uhlole ifayela lakho lelogi ye-Altitude ngezinkinga.
PROMPT.CLIENTUNKNOWNERRORINFO: Kube nenkinga yokuxhumana neMetrix Core. Kunconywa ukuthi uhlole ifayela lakho le-debug.log ngezinkinga.
PROMPT.UNENROLLGOVERNORCONTENT: Ingabe uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukubhalisa uMbusi wakho? Ngeke usakwazi ukuvota ekuphathweni kwamaketanga.

ADDRESSBOOK.TITLE: Ibhuku lekheli
ADDRESSBOOK.SENDINGINFO: Leli yikheli lakho elondoloziwe le-Metrix lokuthumela izinkokhelo. Njalo hlola inani nokuthola ikheli ngaphambi kokuthumela izinhlamvu zemali
ADDRESSBOOK.RECEIVINGINFO: Leli yikheli lakho elondoloziwe le-Metrix lokuthola izinkokhelo.

MAINCHAINCHECK.ALERT: Isexwayiso! Awukho kuketheni elikhulu ngokusho kwesihloli seMetrix. Kunconywe kakhulu ukuvumelanisa kabusha noma kabusha i-bootstrap yakho ye-blockchain ukugwema ukulahleka kwanoma yiziphi izinhlamvu zemali.

NOTIFICATIONS.CHECKINGUPDATEFAILED: Ayikwazi ukuhlola ukubuyekezwa. Hlola inethiwekhi yakho.
NOTIFICATIONS.SENDINGEXCEEDSBALANCE: Inani othumelayo lidlula ibhalansi yakho ekhethiwe
NOTIFICATIONS.INSUFFICIENTBALANCE: Ibhalansi enganele okhethiwe ukuqedela lo msebenzi
NOTIFICATIONS.GENERICERROR: Kuvele iphutha elingaziwa. Kungadingeka uqale kabusha isikhwama sakho bese uzama futhi. Uma izinkinga ziqhubeka sicela uthinte ukwesekwa.
NOTIFICATIONS.MINIMUMCONFIRMATIONS: Zonke izimpendulo zidinga okungenani ukuqinisekiswa okungu-1 ngaphambi kokuchitha.
NOTIFICATIONS.FAILEDTOWRITECONFIG: Kube nenkinga yokubhalela ifayela lakho le-metrix.conf. Bheka ifayela ukuthi likhona nokuthi i-Altitude inezimvume zokubhala.
NOTIFICATIONS.NOPUBLICUP: Alikho ikheli le-IP lomphakathi elitholakele. Hlola ukuxhumana kwakho kwe-inthanethi bese uqala kabusha i-Altitude.
NOTIFICATIONS.REPORTINGISSUE: Ukuthola imininingwane yokuxilonga... Lolu lwazi luzokopishelwa kubhodi yakho yokunameka.

GOVERNANCE.NOTGOVERNORDETAIL: Ababusi banesibopho sokuvota kwisabelomali sanyanga zonke kanye noshintsho lwe-blockchain. Ungaba uMbusi ngokuvala isivumelwano esifanele kwinkontileka Kahulumeni.
GOVERNANCE.CONFIRMENROLL: Ususondele ukubhalisa njengoMbusi. Lokhu kuzothumela ukuthengiselana ngesivumelwano esidingekayo kwinkontileka yokubusa. Ungavula noma kunini.
GOVERNANCE.ISGOVERNORDETAIL1: Ababusi banesibopho sokuvota kwisabelomali sanyanga zonke kanye noshintsho lwe-blockchain.
GOVERNANCE.ISGOVERNORDETAIL2: Ukuze uhlale ungumbusi kuzodingeka uhlanganyele okungenani kuvoti eli-1 njalo ezinsukwini ezingama-30.
GOVERNANCE.ISGOVERNORDETAIL3: Uma kungabikho lutho ongavota ngalo, ungaqhubeka nokubhalisa kwakho ngokuthumela i-ping esebenzayo.
GOVERNANCE.NOTFULLYSYNCEDDETAIL: Isimo sakho sokubhaliswa koMbusi sizobonakala uma i-blockchain yakho isivunyelaniswa ngokugcwele.
GOVERNANCE.DGPMIGRATIONINFO: I-Metrix blockchain ibhekene nokufuduka kwe-DGP. Uzodinga ukuzikhipha enkontilekeni endala ye-DGP futhi ubhalise kabusha entsha. Uma unoMbusi omdala uzobona kuphela inkinobho yokukhipha ukubhalisa kuleli khasi.
GOVERNANCE.DGPMIGRATIONINFO2: Ukubhaliswa kwe-DGP entsha kuzokwenzeka uma kusebenze i-onchain. Ukungezwani kwethu kuzoqukatha ulwazi lwakamuva ngalokhu.
GOVERNANCE.UNENROLLV1INFO1: Inkinobho engezansi izokhipha inguqulo yakho endala ethi Governor futhi ikubuyisele isibambiso sakho.
GOVERNANCE.UNENROLLV1INFO2: Uma ukukhishwa kwakho sekuqediwe le nketho izonyamalala.

BUDGET.TITLE: Iziphakamiso zeBhajethi
BUDGET.MINIMUMGOVERNORS: Izabelomali azikwazi ukudluliswa kuze kube yilapho isibalo esincane sababusi sikhona kulolu chungechunge.

CREATEPROPOSAL.TITLE: Dala Isiphakamiso
CREATEPROPOSAL.DESCRIPTION: Ngezansi ungakha isiphakamiso sesabelomali futhi usithumele kunethiwekhi yokuvota ngaphambi kwebhulali yokulungiswa kwesabelomali esilandelayo.

NOTIFICATIONS.INCOMPLETEFORM: Awuzange ugcwalise zonke izinkambu ezidingekayo kahle
NOTIFICATIONS.INVALIDPROPOSALDURATION: Isikhathi sokuphakanyiswa kufanele sibe phakathi kwezinyanga ezi-1 nezingu-12
NOTIFICATIONS.ENROLLEDGOVERNOR: Ukubhalisa kwakho kuzoqedwa lapho ukuthengiselana kwakho sekuqinisekisiwe
NOTIFICATIONS.VOTEDONPROPOSAL: Ukuvota kwakho kuzobalwa uma umsebenzi uqinisekisiwe.
NOTIFICATIONS.PINGEDGOVERNOR: I-Ping ithunyelwe ngempumelelo. UMbusi wakho uzobuyekezwa uma ukuthengiselana sekuqinisekisiwe
NOTIFICATIONS.UNENROLLEDGOVERNOR: Okwenziwayo kuthunyelwe. UMbusi wakho uzobe engabhalisiwe lapho ukuthengiselana sekuqinisekisiwe
NOTIFICATIONS.GOVERNORNOTMATURE: Umbusi wakho akakakhuli ngokwanele ukwenza lesi senzo okwamanje

HOME.INFOLINE1: Lapho usunekheli lediphozi le-BTC, noma iyiphi i-BTC ethunyelwe kulelo kheli izoshintshelwa i-MRX ngokuzenzakalela kukheli lakho le-MRX elikhethiwe.
HOME.INFOLINE2-1: Ukuthengiselana kucaca kungakapheli ihora kuye ngezikhathi ze-Bitcoin block.
HOME.INFOLINE2-2: Ngokusebenzisa le sevisi, uyavuma ukuthi AUHLALI emazweni abhalwe ohlwini
HOME.INFOLINE3: Lapho idiphozi yakho ye-BTC isisuliwe uzothola i-MRX yakho kukheli lakho elikhethiwe.

NOTIFICATIONS.ALREADYHAVEADDRESS: Usuvele unekheli le-BTC elihlotshaniswa naleli kheli le-Metrix

NOTIFICATIONS.MNSUNKNOWNERROR: Ukulungiswa kwegama kuhlulekile, kwenzeke iphutha elingaziwa.
NOTIFICATIONS.MNSRESOLUTIONUNAVAILABLE: I-MNS: Ayikwazi ukuxazulula igama, Hlola ukuthi igama lilungile futhi i-blockchain iyavunyelaniswa.
